entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING IN EFFECT, St. Alban's
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:46 AM NDT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Sunday: Rain at times heavy. High 8 except 13 inland.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy and fog. Amount 30 mm except 40 mm in areas of heaviest rain. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60. High 8 except 13 inland. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain or drizzle. Low 6.
entry.summary: Rain changing to drizzle overnight. Fog. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 this evening. Low 6. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Monday: Showers or drizzle. High 8 except 12 inland.
entry.summary: Drizzle changing to showers in the morning and ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Fog dissipating in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind south 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the morning then becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High 8 except 12 inland. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. High plus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of showers. High 6. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 40 percent chance of showers. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of showers. High 8. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Thursday night: Cloudy periods. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 10.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Friday night: Cloudy periods. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Saturday: Cloudy. High 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Sunday 08 May 2016
